patthana17.21:1.1_0: Sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto
patthana17.21:1.1_1: nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ
patthana17.21:1.1_2: paṭicca nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Sukhāya
patthana17.21:1.1_3: vedanāya sampayuttaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto
patthana17.21:1.1_4: nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ
patthana17.21:1.1_5: paṭicca nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto nakusalo ca naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto
patthana17.21:1.1_6: nakusalo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. Sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ
patthana17.21:1.1_7: paṭicca nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto nakusalo ca naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto
patthana17.21:1.1_8: nakusalo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. Sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ
patthana17.21:1.1_9: paṭicca nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto nakusalo ca nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto
patthana17.21:1.1_10: nakusalo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. Sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ
patthana17.21:1.1_11: paṭicca nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto nakusalo ca nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto
patthana17.21:1.1_12: nakusalo ca naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto nakusalo ca dhammā uppajjanti
patthana17.21:2.1: Adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … satta. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana17.21:3.1: Hetuyā cuddasa, adhipatiyā cuddasa …pe… avigate cuddasa.
patthana17.21:4.1: Sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … satta.
patthana17.21:5.1: Dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … satta.
patthana17.21:6.1: Adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … satta. (Ekavīsati pañhā.)
patthana17.21:8.1: Sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto abyākato dhammo nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa naabyākatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana17.21:9.1_0: Ārammaṇe ekavīsati, adhipatiyā dasa, anantare cha …pe… upanissaye ekavīsati, natthiyā
patthana17.21:9.1_1: vigate cha. (Dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaabyākatamūlaṁ adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya
